name: awesome-mac
description: ï£¿ This repo is a collection of awesome Mac applications and tools for developers and designers.

data.title: Reading and Writing Tools
data.des: *Applications to edit text, I suggest the open-source editors*

items.name: Atom
items.des: Hackable text editor for the 21st century made by GitHub.

items.des: A powerful desktop app for creating responsive websites using the Bootstrap framework.

items.des: Automatic time and productivity tracking for Mac. Helps you stay on track with your work and ensures no billable hours get lost if you are billing hourly.

items.name: Trello
items.des: A collaboration tool that organizes your projects into Kanban boards.

items.name: Ukelele
items.des: Unicode Keyboard Layout Editor.

items.name: xScope
items.des: Powerful set of tools that are ideal for measuring, inspecting & testing on-screen graphics and layouts.

items.name: Z
items.des: Powerful way to navigate easily by typing only a string of directory name in terminal instead of typing exact location of director.

items.name: Amethyst
items.des: Tiling window manager.

items.name: chunkwm
items.des: Tiling window manager for macOS based on plugin architecture.

items.name: contexts
items.des: Provides more power than the native Mac Dock. Especially when you have multiple screens, it can help you switch more quickly.

items.name: Divvy
items.des: Window management at its finest with its amazing Divvy Grid system.

items.name: Hummingbird
items.des: Easily move and resize windows without mouse clicks, from anywhere within a window.

items.name: Magnet
items.des: Window manager that keeps your workspace organized.

items.name: Moom
items.des: Allows you to easily move and zoom windows, or to another displayâusing either the mouse or the keyboard.

items.name: ShiftIt
items.des: Managing window size and position in OSX.

items.name: SizeUp
items.des: Powerful, keyboard-centric window management.

items.name: Slate
items.des: Window management application similar to Divvy and SizeUp (except better and free!). (

items.name: Spectacle
items.des: Move and resize windows with simple and customizable keyboard shortcuts.

items.name: Total Spaces
items.des: Provides window management much like ubuntu. Creates hotkeys for workspaces which allows you to easily move around.

items.name: yabai
items.des: Tiling window manager for macOS. A rewrite of chunkwm, it provides a more seamless integration with the operating system.

items.name: 1Password
items.des: Cross-platform password management tool.

items.name: Authy
items.des: Two-factor authentication token manager that backs up and syncs across your devices.

items.name: Bitwarden
items.des: Open source password management tool for Mac OS, iOS and browsers.

items.name: Buttercup
items.des: The Password Manager You Deserve

items.name: Dashlane
items.des: Cloud-based password manager with award-winning design.

items.name: Enpass
items.des: Cross-platform password management tool with cloud integration.

items.name: Keeweb
items.des: Free, cross-platform password manager compatible with KeePass.

items.name: LastPass
items.des: Password management tool for Mac OS and browser.

items.name: MacPass
items.des: Open-source KeePass Mac OS client.

items.name: SafeInCloud
items.des: Cross Platform password management, low cost app!

items.name: fman
items.des: The first dual-pane file manager to integrate features from Sublime Text.

items.name: ForkLift
items.des: The most advanced dual pane file manager and file transfer client for macOS.

items.name: Path Finder
items.des: File management app.

items.name: QSpace
items.des: A clean and efficient Multi-view File Manager.

items.name: TotalFinder
items.des: Chrome-styled Finder substitute.

items.name: XtraFinder
items.des: Adds tabs and cut to Mac Finder.

items.name: CheatSheet
items.des: Hold the â-Key to get a list of all active shortcuts of the current application. It's as simple as that.

items.name: f.lux
items.des: Makes the color of your computer's display adapt to the time of day.

items.name: KeyCastr
items.des: Open-source keystroke visualizer.

items.name: NightOwl
items.des: Automatically switch between macOS Mojave's light and dark themes by time of day or with a menu bar or keyboard shortcut.

items.name: Shifty
items.des: A macOS menu bar app that gives you more control over Night Shift.

items.name: Snap
items.des: Launch an app in a snap. Ridiculously easy shortcut management.

items.name: Amphetamine
items.des: Override your energy saver settings and keep your Mac awake.

items.name: AppCleaner
items.des: Small application which allows you to thoroughly uninstall unwanted apps.

items.name: Background Music
items.des: Automatically pause your music, set individual apps' volumes and record system audio.

items.name: Cleaner for Xcode
items.des: Helps make your Xcode faster by removing unwanted and deprecated files.

items.name: coconutBattery
items.des: Shows live information about the battery in your Mac. Includes: manufacture date, capacity, cycle count, battery status, temperature, discharging power.

items.name: Coolant
items.des: Menubar app that lets you know when an app is consuming 100% CPU or more than a gigabyte of memory (or any arbitrary limits you choose).

items.name: DaisyDisk
items.des: Gives a great overview of disk usage. Can also make more disk-space available by cleaning up your disk.

items.name: FruitJuice
items.des: Will let you know how long to stay unplugged each day to keep your battery healthy.

items.name: gfxCardStatus
items.des: Unobtrusive menu bar app for OS X that allows MacBook Pro users to see which apps are affecting their battery life by using the more power-hungry graphics.

items.name: Gray
items.des: Pick between the light appearance and the dark appearance on a per-app basis with the click of a button.

items.name: HandShaker
items.des: Mac on the management of Android mobile phone content.

items.name: HTML5 Player
items.des: HTML 5 video player. Keep your Mac from "burning".

items.name: iStat Menus
items.des: Advanced Mac system monitor on the menubar.

items.name: iStats
items.des: Command-line tool that allows you to easily grab the CPU temperature, fan speeds and battery information on OSX.

items.name: Juice
items.des: Make your battery information a bit more interesting.

items.name: KeepingYouAwake
items.des: Alternative to Caffeine with better support for dark mode in Mac.

items.name: Monity
items.des: System monitoring widget for OS X.

items.name: Mounty
items.des: Tiny tool to re-mount write-protected NTFS volumes under Mac OS X 10.9+ in read-write mode.

items.name: NitroShare
items.des: Cross-platform network file transfer utility.

items.name: Noti
items.des: Receive Android notifications on your Mac (with Pushbullet).

items.name: OmniDiskSweeper
items.des: Shows you the files on your drive, ordered by size. It can be used to find and remove unused files.

items.name: OnyX
items.des: Multifunction utility to verify disks and files, run cleaning and system maintenance tasks, configure hidden options and more.

items.name: Paragon NTFS
items.des: Read/write access to NTFS in macOS Sierra.

items.name: Porting Kit
items.des: Install WindowsÂ® Games inside your Mac.

items.name: SSH Tunnel
items.des: Application for managing SSH connections.

items.name: TG Pro
items.des: Temperature monitoring, fan control & hardware diagnostics to help keep your Mac cool and healthy.

items.name: Tuxera NTFS
items.des: Full read-write compatibility with NTFS-formatted drives on a Mac.

items.name: Overkill
items.des: Stop iTunes from opening when you connect your iPhone.

items.name: OpenEmu
items.des: A great video game console emulator, supports many different emulators in a single application. (e.g. Sony PSP, GameBoy, NDS and so on)

items.name: PPSSPP
items.des: A awesome PSP emulator for any OS you can dream of!

items.name: AnyDesk
items.des: Provides Remote access across multiple machines.

items.name: RealVNC
items.des: The original and best software for remote access across desktop and mobile.

items.name: TeamViewer
items.des: Proprietary computer software package for remote control, desktop sharing, online meetings, web conferencing and file transfer between computers.

items.name: Chirper
items.des: A simple and tiny menu bar app for Buffer/Twitter that helps you tweet your thoughts without opening anything.

items.name: Flume
items.des: A beautiful Instagram experience for your Mac. The free version is good enough if you only want to do the browsing instead of posting.

items.name: QuicklookStephen
items.des: Preview plain text files without or with unknown file extension. such as READMEãINSTALLãCapfileãCHANGELOG...

data.title: Third Party App Markets
data.des: If you come across websites offering pirated software or cracks, please post [HERE](https://github.com/jaywcjlove/awesome-mac/issues/17). We love apps, but only authentic ones. :)

items.name: Setapp
items.des: The best apps for Mac in one suite.

items.name: Cakebrew
items.des: GUI client for Homebrew. Install, check or remove apps, no command-line needed.

items.name: Homebrew Cask
items.des: Command line installation manager which extends Homebrew and brings its elegance, simplicity, and speed to Mac OS applications and large binaries alike.

items.name: Homebrew
items.des: The missing package manager for macOS.

items.name: MacPorts
items.des: Open-source community initiative to design an easy-to-use system for compiling, installing, and upgrading either command-line, X11 or Aqua based open-source software on the Mac OS X operating system.

items.name: MacUpdate Desktop
items.des: Simplifies finding, buying and installing apps for your Mac.

data.des: *Here are some of the major software download sites, there are a number of OSX Mac software sites*

items.name: alternativeTo
items.des: Also a very nice community. If you are looking for some alternative apps

items.name: Slant
items.des: I personally recommend this. This is a platform where you can compare apps side-by-side, you might get an idea by seeing other users recommendations. Please contribute if you find an application from this list!

items.name: Mac Power Users
items.des: Learn about getting the most from your Apple technology with focused topics and workflow guests.
